<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lawbringer](/Feats.aspx?ID=4545) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Lineage" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=317" />
<trait label="Nephilim" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=518" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 79 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You trace your lineage to [archons](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=9), guardians of the seventiered mountain of [Heaven](/Planes.aspx?ID=17) and nurturers of law and virtue within mortals. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saves against [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60) effects, and if you roll a success on a save against an emotion effect, you get a critical success instead.
name: Lawbringer
